title: Algorithm Plugin Input Arguments
description: A schema for algorithm plugin input arguments

annotated_ground_truth_path.title: Annotated ground truth path
annotated_ground_truth_path.description: Select the dataset containing image file names and corresponding ground truth labels

file_name_label.title: Name of column containing image file names
file_name_label.description: Key in the name of the column containing the file names in the annotated ground truth dataset

set_seed.title: Seed for selection of data for display
set_seed.description: Change to a specific seed for random selection the sample data for display if desired

include.title: Name(s) of digital corruption to include
include.description: Specify the name(s) of digital corruption function to include. Default: 'all'

brightness_down_factor.title: Brightness Down factor value(s)
brightness_down_factor.description: Customize the factor value(s) for the Brightness Down corruption function

brightness_up_factor.title: Brightness Up factor value(s)
brightness_up_factor.description: Customize the factor value(s) for the Brightness Up corruption function

contrast_down_factor.title: Contrast Down factor value(s)
contrast_down_factor.description: Customize the factor value(s) for the Contrast Down corruption function

contrast_up_factor.title: Contrast Up factor value(s)
contrast_up_factor.description: Customize the factor value(s) for the Contrast Up corruption function

saturate_down_factor.title: Saturate Down factor value(s)
saturate_down_factor.description: Customize the factor value(s) for the Saturate Down corruption function

saturate_up_factor.title: Saturate Up factor value(s)
saturate_up_factor.description: Customize the factor value(s) for the Saturate Up corruption function

random_perspective_sigma.title: Random Perspective sigma value(s)
random_perspective_sigma.description: Customize the sigma value(s) for the Random Perspective corruption function

jpeg_compression_quality.title: JPEG Compression quality value(s)
jpeg_compression_quality.description: Customize the quality value(s) for the JPEG Compression corruption function
